headline.main: Researchers Identify Subtle Biological Signs That Warn of Diabetes

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Recent findings are giving doctors a new ability to predict who is most susceptible to the most common form of adult diabetes.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Recent findings are giving doctors a new ability to predict who is most susceptible to the most common form of adult diabetes.
